SELECT * FROM pick_table ORDER BY reg_date DESC

SELECT pot.pick_id as pick_id, pot.id as option_id, pot.product_id as product_id, p.title as title, p.price as price, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pick_option_vote_table pov WHERE pot.id = pov.pick_option_id ) as vote_cnt, ( SELECT pi.product_img_link FROM product_img pi WHERE pi.product_id = p.id AND ROWNUM = 1 ) as img, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product_like pl WHERE pl.product_id = p.id ) as product_zzim_count FROM pick_option_table pot INNER JOIN product p on p.id = pot.product_id WHERE pot.pick_id = #{pick_id}
